content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position -7.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to the power network and has no input liquid, while the boiler is at full output with water and steam present.

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(0, 0)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(5, 5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to the assembling machine at position(z1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the small electric pole is placed correctly and not blocked by other entities before attempting to connect it to the steam engine. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors with power connections
- Verify that all power-consuming entities are connected to a power network to avoid "no power" errors.
